verbose_text: Third, inosine (but not adenosine) can inhibit the activation of poly (ADP-ribose) polymerase enzyme (PARP) preserving cells from a suicidal utilization of NAD + and ATP and, subsequently, cell death.
evidence: inosine (but not adenosine) can inhibit the activation of poly(ADP-ribose) polymerase enzyme (PARP) preserving cells from a suicidal utilization of NAD +  and ATP and, subsequently, cell death
